name: Hotline Omsk
description:
Severe Omsk is a one cold-blooded city. If you wish to survive in this place, bring something really big and deadly. It is this truth that our protagonist has learned by heart, so he is ready to fight to the end.

Hotline Omsk - 2D Top-Down shooter where you play as a brutal bandit whos only goal is to terminate other bandits for the sake of survival. Expect dynamic and hardcore shootouts in the narrow-spaced interiors of multi-storey panel buildings, with just one attempt to escape without taking any damage.

Game Features:
-Pixel Art
- Difficulty
- Music
